Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good morning.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's work hard
today, shall we?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what brings you here at this hour?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How's your work going?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good afternoon, <MYNAME>. What brings you
here?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good afternoon. How are you?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. That's evening, as in
the end of the day. And you're just greeting me
now. Earlier would be nice!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What brings you here this late at night? I'm
busy, so make it quick, whatever it is.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! I've been working hard all day today. I
think I deserve a break. Maybe I should ask my
maids to give me a massage...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. ...N-not that I'm
particularly happy to see you or anything!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. What a lovely day! ...Especially
now that you're here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Um, no, forget I said that!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, you're here early. Couldn't wait to see me,
hmm?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...You're supposed to brush that off and deny it,
you know? If you said yes to that, I'd blush like
you wouldn't believe.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good afternoon, <MYNAME>. Here we are, hard
at work since long before dawn.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I always feel ready for a nap around this time of
day...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good afternoon, <MYNAME>. Hmm, half the
day's already gone by. Well, we've got half a day
left. Let's make the most of it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Eek! D-don't just pop up like that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>N-not that I was surprised because I happened
to be thinking about you or anything...!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I thought you were sick, you'd been away so
long. ...You had me a little worried.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're dropping by to see me at this hour?
Were you busy all day?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I suppose just seeing me must
help you feel better, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Wait, you just instantly say yes to that? You're
too honest for your own good, you know.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. ...You're drooling.
Go on, wash your face.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Good morning, <MYNAME>. You know, you
called my name in your sleep last night.
<PAGE>
What were you dreaming about? Tell me all
about it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's work our
hardest today.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You know, it's already noon, <MYNAME>. We're
a couple. We should talk more often.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No matter how busy we are, <MYNAME>, we
should never forget to tell each other, "Good
morning." It's a sign of respect.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you still working?
<PAGE>
If you're busy, I can lend a hand.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh my, you left your lovely wife all alone until
now. What were you thinking...?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, <MYNAME>. Since you left me
alone all day, you have to spend time with me
tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I've been lonely, you know. ...What do you
mean, "I'm unusually friendly?" I'm always
friendly!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're done with work? Lovely, we can
spend a little time together tonight. I have so
much I want to tell you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice weather today, no? The perfect sort of
weather for enjoying a nice cup of tea in the
garden.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh, it's raining today. I hate going out in this
kind of weather. My dress gets so filthy...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ugh, this heat! My skin just burns like a torch
whenever I go out in this much sun.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I can't say I care for the humidity much...
<PAGE>
But thanks to the rain, I don't need to water the
crops. It's nice to have a break every once in a
while.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People say autumn weather is unpredictable, but
today's quite lovely. I hope every day is like this.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rain brings a chill, especially with winter on the
way. This calls for my favorite cape.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Brr... It's cold... Pardon me, <MYNAME>, will
you be a dear and bring me a jacket?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh-hohoho, I do enjoy a good snowfall. I hope it
settles into nice, pleasant piles.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Yeesh, was that lightning?! It was so loud...
Did it hit the ground?
<PAGE>
H-hey, <MYNAME>, listen. It isn't safe out there
right now. You should stay here. Understood?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, look at all this snow! Really gets you
going, doesn't it? ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I-it won't stop thundering... Hey, <MYNAME>?
You're not planning on going anywhere today,
are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It's too dangerous out there. Let's both stay in
and spend some time together. ...Please don't
leave me here by myself.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's so much snow. If you go out today, be
careful. Don't slip on the street and get hurt, or
worse...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, <MYNAME>, look at you! It's like being
with your new sweetheart has you walking on
air!
<PAGE>
Everybody's talking about you.
<PAGE>
I'm sure you'll make your special someone very
happy. So congratulations, and best wishes!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The restaurant's food is decent and the chef is
friendly. The ambiance isn't bad, either.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There're always so many girls at the restaurant. I
heard a whole gaggle of them stopped by from
another town not too long ago.
<PAGE>
I can understand why. I suppose Raeger's a bit
of a dish. But he's not my cup of tea, so to
speak.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think you're doing in someone
else's garden?! Don't tell me you're covertly
scoping out the competition...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I want this, this aaaaand that. Oh, and this, too!
Hee hee, I just love shopping. ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You run this mountain trail every day, don't you?
I have to say I respect you for that.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*sigh* I'm exhausted. Before I came to this
town, I went everywhere by car, you see.
<PAGE>
I'm not used to walking on the mountain trails
just yet. Not sure I'll ever get used to it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I'm the one who chose to live here, so I
guess I'll just have to get used to it, right? I
certainly can't back down now!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I may have walked here, but I didn't enjoy it.
There are bugs and wild animals absolutely
everywhere. It has me constantly on edge!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I listen to the sound of the river, I finally
start to feel relaxed. Living in the country
surrounded by nature...might not be so bad.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The babbling of the water, the songs of the
birds...there's definitely something to be said for
the simple folks' way of life.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear this place is good for fruit and tea leaves.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If I can put this place to good use, my tea time
will be wonderful.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These slopes around here aren't that steep, but
they're hard on my feet. Could you lend me a
hand?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who's growing crops here...?
<PAGE>
Huh? Old Mrs. Eda...? I see. I thought she might
be good at this sort of thing.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Mushrooms thrive on humidity. I, on the other
hand, do not, so I stay as far from mushrooms
as I can.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It's not just the humidity, either. You never know
what bugs might be lurking in the soil. Ugh, I
get goosebumps just thinking about it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's a whiff of something sweet in the air
here. It's lovely how the scent of flowers and
honey carries so well on the wind...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This flower garden is wonderful! Giorgio is
growing it, right? There's quite a bit I'd like to
learn from him.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's quite a walk here from home...
<PAGE>
I used to think it'd be easier to bulldoze the
forest around my house and farm that instead.
<PAGE>
But nature is what this town's all about. I
shouldn't just rip a bunch of trees down for my
own benefit.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This field is out of everyone's way, but it's got a
lot of space. I can see why people want it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This place is certainly large enough for farming,
but I'd hate to see Fritz ruin it for everyone.
<PAGE>
Really, this place is best off in my hands...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd never seen a water wheel until I came here. In
the town where I used to live, everyone uses
pumps.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the closest field to my house, and the
easiest one to work with.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What brings you here?
<PAGE>
Did you come to see this field I'm using?
<PAGE>
...What do you think of my farm? If you have
any advice, please let me know.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The people in this town are so easygoing. I
guess that's just...the way things are around
here.
<PAGE>
Everybody's surprisingly nice, too...and I
guess...that's really not so bad after all...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can't believe all the townsfolk are okay with
living in such tiny houses. Don't they feel
cramped? Do they know something I don't...?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you interested in my house? You can visit
anytime you like. Don't be shy.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love all things beautiful and cute. I have whole
collection of them.
<PAGE>
And I'd say you've earned a peek next time. Hope
you look forward to it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, this farm work is actually rather
enjoyable.
<PAGE>
Not to say that I work as hard as you. I merely
lend a hand now and again.
<PAGE>
Not like you. You eat, breathe and sleep crops
and livestock, night and day!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? You think I grew up as an only child or
the youngest child?
<PAGE>
Well, I do have an older sister, so yes, I'm the
youngest... How did you know?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I visited the inn the other day, the staff
was in a panic, just because they were all out of
bread for the customers...
<PAGE>
I remembered I had some bread left at my place,
so I brought it over, and they really thanked me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I didn't know helping other people could feel so
good. I think it gives me some idea of why
you're always working so hard.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The two sisters at the inn always stick together,
don't they? Just like my sister and me, back
when I was younger.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, you're simple. You're a very simple
person, but you're also kind and generous,
incredibly so.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>So I'd like to keep on being good friends with
you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gee, is that <MYNAME> talking? I can't hear
anything!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
As your girlfriend, I'd very much appreciate it if
you'd be a bit more of a gentleman.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Girls like me are hard to find, you know. Don't
ever forget that, and don't forget to thank me,
either. ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems everyone just has to know absolutely
everything about the two of us.
<PAGE>
"What's our favorite date spot?" "Who made the
first move?" On and on...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But don't worry. Our memories together are
treasures, and I won't give them up for anyone.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, common people actually lead very
interesting lives, in their own way.
<PAGE>
I never paid much attention before, but once I
thought about settling down with you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>D-did I just...? No, I didn't say that. You didn't
hear anything about that, got it?!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><MYNAME>, when I'm with you, we have all
these great new experiences every day.
<PAGE>
So promise me you'll stay with me forever.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We both know how selfish I am. But you don't
care; you just accept it with a smile every time.
Why is that?
<PAGE>
Why are you always so generous? So patient,
and kind, and caring... You've always been the
one to keep us together, you know that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So...thank you, <MYNAME>. Thanks for always
accepting me for who I am.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. How long have you been
there? Sorry, you're just hard to notice
sometimes.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*sigh* Who knew married life would be this
boring? Clearly, I expected far too much.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've heard people can change after marriage, and
not always for the better. But you won't change
at all, will you?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, the life of a commoner isn't so bad,
really.
<PAGE>
Don't get me wrong; I'm not saying it's easy
doing all this work myself. It's not, at all. But in
a way, I seem to be enjoying the experience.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, <MYNAME>. What do you...think
about...my cooking?
<PAGE>
I had a few cooking lessons way back when, but
I never actually cooked for anyone until we got
married. So...how do you like it?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's funny... I'm much less lonely living in this
tiny house with you than with all the staff in my
entire mansion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Meeting you was the best thing that ever
happened to me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...What? You're flat-out asking me if I love you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wh-wh-why would you ask me that?! Don't you
already know?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>All right, all right! Listen VERY carefully, because
I'm only going to say this once! ...I love you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
There, satisfied? Hey, wipe that grin off your
face! You're making me blush!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're my boyfriend now, so don't be nervous.
Be proud of yourself!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We had so little time together...but I know in my
heart that you'll be forever grateful for the honor
of my company.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've been granted the unique privilege of a
second chance with me. There is no greater gift
in all the world.
<PAGE>
If you need that in plain English: This is your last
chance. Take better care of me this time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can hardly wait for the wedding. Sadly, it
seems my family has urgent business and can't
attend in person...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I'll tell them all about it in a letter, so let's
make sure I have plenty to write about.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
At the wedding...you were so handsome. I hate
to admit this, but I fell in love with you all over
again.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I just can't even imagine there's a baby in my
belly. I mean...right here? Baby? Really?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Oh, our baby just moved! Oh-hohoho, I can
feel it. It's really here!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our baby's almost due. Oh-hohoho, it's so
exciting! What do you think, boy or girl?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, they're definitely our children. And they're
so cute! I can't wait to see how they grow up.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our children have officially mastered crawling.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>They're such quick learners. They must get that
from your side, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
These days, <CHILD_NAME_M> is becoming more like
you.
<PAGE>
But <CHILD_NAME_W> is becoming more like me, isn't
she? I suppose the apple really doesn't fall far
from the tree.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh, you're giving me this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>? You're so sweet!
<PAGE>
Just what I wanted. I'll take it. Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You picked this out for me? You know what I
like, don't you?
<PAGE>
I graciously accept. Thank you!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a thoughtful gift. Thank you!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Thank you. I'll take it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Not very good at picking out presents, are you?
Ugh, unbelievable. Well, I suppose I'll take it this
time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Really now, what made you think I would want
this?
<PAGE>
I won't compound your shame by letting it go to
waste, so here, I'll take it. But next time, you'll
have to do better.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... Why are you
carrying that? I don't want it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I said I don't want it... I can't eat it, but I
shouldn't throw it away... Now what am I
supposed to do?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this is for me? Why, thank you! Oh, it's
delicious!
<PAGE>
I love the way it twinkles, and it looks so sweet!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, you don't see these around here every
day... Oh, for me? Why, thank you!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm, I can't say I care for this...but I'll take it, if
you insist.
Let's not give her a present now.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What is this, a handout? Do I look like I need
this from a STRANGER?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>No, I won't take it. Put it away.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...<MYNAME>, before you give me that, don't
you have something to say?
<PAGE>
You left your girlfriend high and dry for a long
time. It takes more than a present to make up for
that.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm not the kind of girl you can buy off with
presents, you know.
<PAGE>
I'm your wife, and you've left me alone all this
time. If you want to make up for it, stop
ignoring me and let's talk like an actual couple.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, you've already given me a present today.
Let's not go overboard.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not dating you for the presents, you know. I
really don't need this many all at once.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I appreciate the thought. Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I appreciate the thought, but you already gave
me something. I don't need this on top of it.
Thank you, though.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh, is this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for me? It's
my favorite! You picked this out for my
birthday?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>Th-thank you. I'm so happy right now...! Mmm,
I'll enjoy every bite!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love this. What a sweet birthday present. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So you chose this for my birthday present, did
you? You have chosen...wisely. No, really, you
have. You're amazing.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, you remembered my birthday. Huh. All
right, I'll take it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...You know today is my birthday, right? You're
not trying to make me feel bad by giving me
this, are you?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What in the world were you thinking, giving me
THIS on my birthday?
<PAGE>
...Well, fine. I'll take it this time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're giving me <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for
my birthday? ...Why?
<PAGE>
Next time, just rip a few flowers off the street or
something. Or better yet, put a little thought into
it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like this because it's sparkly and sweet, like me!
This is a great birthday present, <MYNAME>.
Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is so beautiful... *ahem* Yes, this is
entirely acceptable. Surprisingly well done.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's got a very pretty shine to it...but all in all, I
would have preferred something else.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, it never occurred to me before I
came out here that rabbits actually roam in the
wild.
<PAGE>
I'd always seen them in pet shops and zoos. It
was strange the first time I saw them running
around free in a field.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
W-what is that animal, and why are its eyes so
scary...?! Don't bring it any closer!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you call that animal? An "ermine," is it?
A strange name for a strange creature.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...what's the deal with the monkey? Oh, it's
a "sifaka"? That's nice, I suppose.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, now that's adorable. I don't usually get this
close to penguins.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Okay, don't let that anywhere near me.
<PAGE>
N-no, I've got nothing against monkeys. I just
want you to make it go away!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's...a parrot, isn't it? My uncle used to
have one of these.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you always taking animals around with you?
<PAGE>
Look, it's your business, but not everyone likes it
when you show them around. Just saying.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's an Angora rabbit, isn't it? I like its fur.
So fluffy. Especially right on the ears.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a certain chick on the farm who always
seems to like me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But it's so tiny, and it keeps on trying to run
right under my feet. I always worry I'm going to
stomp on it by accident...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Chickens wake up really early, don't they...? I
couldn't stand their cock-a-doodle-doos at first,
but I think I've gotten used to it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh-hohoho, that's adorable. I love dogs. I used
to have a lot of them in my old house, back
before I came here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, he's looking a bit "rotund," I'd say. You may
want to give him a bit more exercise. Not that he
isn't cute the way he is, of course!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like smart dogs. What about you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, he barked just now. It's like he's saying, "I'm
smart!" Of course you are, of course you are!
Come here, cutie.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't know a dog could get so fat. Surprising,
really.
<PAGE>
Look at how round he is! I...actually think he's
kind of cute this way.
